bioghist.p: Sondra Gordon Langford graduated from Bryn Mawr College in 1956. She has authored a number of stories and novels for children and teenagers. Her writings include Red Bird of Ireland, Brendan's Journey, The Magic Shamrock, and Hide Father Hide.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists primarily of manuscripts of Langford's writings. Materials include annotated typescripts and printers proofs of her novels and short stories. The collection also includes printed brochures, maps, language guides, and other items about Ireland and Wales. There is a small amount of correspondence, much of it from around the time Red Bird of Ireland was first published.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
